topic.title: CIA's Bin Laden Files - Open Directory & Torrents [300GB]
topic.body:
Hey all,

As some of you may know, the CIA recently released the contents of Osama bin Laden's hard drive.
I have created torrents of two sets of files. The first is the full underacted 300GB release located at archive.org.

The second was the cleaned up version the CIA re-released later that comes to 250GB. You can see at cia.gov a glossary of what files were removed and changed. This 250GB archive has had a lot of the copyrighted material removed, and all office docs converted to PDF.

---

Torrents:

300GB Unsorted release - Magnet:
magnet:?xt=urn:btih:5970e1db8207a40603a8ef70188202ef57a3d37e&dn=Everything.20171021.zip

250GB Sorted release - Magnet:
magnet:?xt=urn:btih:ed069768afad9f3a4650345104c7ce4c5d764e4d&dn=BinLaden_CIA.zip

---

Open Directory: https://the-eye.eu/public/ladens_trove/

You may also use our Fusker tool to view images on directories all at once. https://fusker.the-eye.eu/
Example Fusker url: https://fusker.the-eye.eu/url.php?url=https%3A%2F%2Fthe-eye.eu%2Fpublic%2Fladens_trove%2F000201032%2F

---

Want to know more about our project? Come to our Discord chat with 2500 other members, don't worry, we won't bite. :) https://discord.gg/XSs7Z77
